titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 251 West Lancaster Street in Fort Worth, Texas, as the "Jim Wright Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

bill.summary: 9/27/1996--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Post Office building located at 251 West Lancaster Street in Fort Worth, Texas, as the Jim Wright Post Office Building.
